content: inspired by lucy neatby i completely used one skein of noro kureyon sock and my unblocked scarf was about 6 feet long and 8 inches wide it s a quite thick and thin yarn so you may need to find the hook size that gives the result you like please note that this pattern was originally done for my weekly column in the daily chum as that website is no longer active i ve made the pattern available as a free ravelry download enjoy
